title: Impossible to climb honors?
body:
Okay, now that i've been out of punishment and had the honor unlocked, I tried to get my honors back. But it is impossible to get honor level 1. It's been 2 months since I was unlocked and I average around 2 honors per game. Literally I think I played around 300 games AFTER the honor was unlocked.

Is this permanent honor ban?

replies.body:
You're still gaining honor at the usual rate, but keep in mind that saying certain things can sometimes be registered even if you don't get punished for it right after the match. There are some recent instances of you belittling your own team and saying things like ggez, which can be viewed rather toxic in certain settings.

If you want some more in-depth context on what could be improved, hit up our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
